name: Gurukeylli Consulting Services LLP
description: Gurukeylli's purpose is to bridge the Industry-Academia skills gap, to ensure skill development to enable students & professionals to be future-ready & employable, to provide Career Consulting & Mentoring services & more...
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Unlocking Pathways to Success
ShortDescription: Gurukeylli's purpose is to bridge the Industry-Academia skills gap, to ensure skill development
enhanced_description: Gurukeylli Consulting Services LLP focuses on bridging the critical skills gap between industry demands and academic offerings. They provide comprehensive skill development programs aimed at making students and professionals future-ready and highly employable. Their services extend to career consulting and mentoring, fostering strong industry-academia connections, and accelerating overall skill development and learning efficiency. Leveraging principles of training management systems and eLearning software, they aim to facilitate personalized learning and effective training methodologies.
key_use_cases: Bridging skill gaps between academic knowledge and industry requirements
Enhancing employability for students and professionals through targeted skill development
Providing career planning and mentorship services
Improving learning efficiency and accelerating skill acquisition
